/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, providing a ground-level view of the city's daily life. The street, lined with trees and buildings, is filled with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. The sky overhead is a clear blue, dotted with white clouds, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting against the blue of the sky and the various colors of the buildings and vehicles.
